title: Superheroes Decoded
overview: Superheroes Decoded offers a definitive look at how marginalised, larger-than-life characters rose to the highest ranks of mainstream culture, dominating the box office and becoming part of the global zeitgeist. Told from the perspective of the most influential creators, fan-favourite artists, leading actors and directors, and the foremost experts in popculture, this series chronicles the rise of Marvel and DC superheroes using original art, new animation, never before seen archival assets and rare behind-the-scenes footage.
